name: Slots - Super Times pay
description:

***More About Slots - Super Times Pay***

We want to hear your feedback. We want to make Slots - Super Times Pay the best it can be for you! If you have any questions or queries, email us at bonuscasinosupport@foxcubgames.com

This game is targeted for an adult audience (21+). This game does not offer "real money gambling" or an opportunity to win real money or prizes. Practice or success at this game does not imply future success at "real money gambling".
